TextView.android:text: We are an integrated sports center that aims to provide individuals with a healthy lifestyle through many of the services we provide, which include fitness classes, training by experienced trainers in the field, swimming, and yoga. Moreover, other our activities include: 1. Training in body exercises: The hall contains professional trainers to teach new participants how to do aerobics with some tips to avoid any injuries or situations that may occur. 2. CrossFit rations: CrossFit classes are held on a daily basis for the participants in the gym to increase fitness and flexibility of the body. 3. Boxing education class: Boxing classes are held on a weekly basis for participants in order to learn self-defense skills.
